title: ICE / ANDRE TENT CONTENT
description: this is where andre's dialogues about the "church/padlock", "who are inside the church" and "tent equipment" are.

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""Oh, so you met her? Good, good.""
dialogueTree.text: "Oh, so you met her? Good, good."

links.title: Empathy: "He's not as glad as he would like y..."
links.text: He's not as glad as he would like you to think. There's concern in his voice.

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""I asked Noid to install a measure..."
dialogueTree.text: "I asked Noid to install a measure against more drifters wandering in. A padlock. It's a temporary fix. Just something to contain the situation."

links.title: Noid: ""I had to do it in a hurry. Not my..."
links.text: "I had to do it in a hurry. Not my best work... But it should hold for a while."

links.title: You: ""I changed my mind about the key. I..."
links.text: "I changed my mind about the key. I'll look into the spookers for you. Just give it to me." (Get the task.)

links.title: Andre: ""Brilliant!" He claps his hands. Th..."
links.text: "Brilliant!" He claps his hands. The air in the tent feels lighter. "Noid, the key!"

links.title: Noid: ""Alright." The speedfreak dips into..."
links.text: "Alright." The speedfreak dips into his belt pack and produces a yellow key. He then makes a sudden, cool-infused move, tossing it in your general direction.

links.title: You: "Be the Cool Cop. Catch the key as i..."
links.text: Be the Cool Cop. Catch the key as it flies toward you!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You sense the trajectory of the lit..."
links.text: You sense the trajectory of the little piece of metal and plastic. The object makes a small ringing sound as it approaches -- just the tiniest chime to your left.

links.title: You: "Catch it."
links.text: Catch it.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "*Ka-ching!* The key hits your palm...."
links.text: *Ka-ching!* The key hits your palm. The speedfreaks nod to you approvingly.

links.title: You: "Bask in the glory."
links.text: Bask in the glory.

links.title: Noid: "The young man with ribcage-shaped s..."
links.text: The young man with ribcage-shaped suspenders looks at you standing there -- with a goofy grin on your face.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The word *august* used as an adject..."
links.text: The word *august* used as an adjective -- that's how cool it feels to be old and cool in the eyes of the young. Let's face it, you're near death yet bathed in the golden rays of stately grandeur. Like a late summer's day. Like a Daddy-O...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Like a Tequila Sunset."
links.text: Like a Tequila Sunset.

links.title: You: "No, none of this Tequila Sunset bus..."
links.text: No, none of this Tequila Sunset business. It's gotten me to death's door. There has to be more in this world...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Are you sure? It's probably too lat..."
links.text: Are you sure? It's probably too late to be a Tequila *Sunrise* now.

links.title: You: "Damn right I am Tequila Sunset. *Ar..."
links.text: Damn right I am Tequila Sunset. *Arriva*!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Of course you are! It's too late to..."
links.text: Of course you are! It's too late to be a Tequila *Sunrise* now... there will be no sunrise, not for you.

links.title: You: "Where did that come from? Why am I..."
links.text: Where did that come from? Why am I a *Tequila Sunset*?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Just felt right. Why, do you want t..."
links.text: Just felt right. Why, do you want to be a Tequila *Sunrise?* It's a little too late for that...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Feels nice. It would feel a whole l..."
links.text: Feels nice. It would feel a whole lot less nice had you dropped them, or worse -- got hit in the eye with them. Good thing that didn't happen!

links.title: You: ""Thanks, man." (Play it cool.)"
links.text: "Thanks, man." (Play it cool.)

links.title: Noid: "The speedfreak nods to you."
links.text: The speedfreak nods to you.

links.title: Authority: "A respectful nod. You proved someth..."
links.text: A respectful nod. You proved something here.

links.title: You: "Don't even look at them. You're *th..."
links.text: Don't even look at them. You're *that* cool. [Leave.]

links.title: Reaction Speed: "It's as if time has frozen somehow...."
links.text: It's as if time has frozen somehow. You think you can *sense* the key moving in the air. Yeah, this is gonna be *way* cool.

links.title: You: "Don't ruin the cool by overdoing it..."
links.text: Don't ruin the cool by overdoing it. Raise your hand in front of your face with minimum effort.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Blam! Straight in the eye. Straight..."
links.text: Blam! Straight in the eye. Straight in the old eye-orb. In *the lookin' ball*!

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Man up! It's nothing. Pick the godd..."
links.text: Man up! It's nothing. Pick the goddamn key up, put it in your pocket, and move on.

links.title: You: ""Ouch! Goddamn asshole... what is W..."
links.text: "Ouch! Goddamn asshole... what is WRONG with you?! Can't you see I'm in PAIN now?!"

links.title: Noid: ""Man, I'm super sorry. That was tot..."
links.text: "Man, I'm super sorry. That was totally my bad, I got overexcited. Threw them too hard. I'm sorry."

links.title: Empathy: "He looks like he's genuinely sorry..."
links.text: He looks like he's genuinely sorry he didn't throw them better.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Andre: ""We were talking about... the padlo..."
links.text: "We were talking about... the padlock I think?"

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, I'm sorry..." (Bend you..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, I'm sorry..." (Bend your face in *mockery* of his useless contrition.) "You almost *eye-murdered* me -- a cop! That's use of LETHAL FORCE!"

links.title: Noid: ""I really am sorry, man -- just tak..."
links.text: "I really am sorry, man -- just take this, okay?" He pulls out some black paper from his belt-pack.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Wow! Looks like there's quite a lot..."
links.text: Wow! Looks like there's quite a lot there...

links.title: You: ""That's the least you could do." (T..."
links.text: "That's the least you could do." (Take the money.)

links.title: Andre: ""I hope that settles it... or wait...."
links.text: "I hope that settles it... or wait..."

links.title: You: ""I don't need your pity money. Now..."
links.text: "I don't need your pity money. Now where were we?" (Don't take the money.)

links.title: Andre: ""The key..." He cautiously hands yo..."
links.text: "The key..." He cautiously hands you the yellow keyring.

links.title: Noid: "He is shifting in his spot uncomfor..."
links.text: He is shifting in his spot uncomfortably, still feeling sorry for the mishap.

links.title: You: "(With your hand on your eye, pick u..."
links.text: (With your hand on your eye, pick up the keys.) "I'm getting too old for this. Where were we?"

links.title: Noid: ""My bad.""
links.text: "My bad."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "A stabbing pain. Tears stream uncon..."
links.text: A stabbing pain. Tears stream uncontrollably from your right eye.

links.title: You: "Let it fall to the ground, then pic..."
links.text: Let it fall to the ground, then pick it up. Like a normal adult person.

links.title: Noid: "Noid watches you pick up the key wi..."
links.text: Noid watches you pick up the key with a smirk.

links.title: You: ""What about the key?""
links.text: "What about the key?"

links.title: Andre: ""Of course. Noid, give the officer..."
links.text: "Of course. Noid, give the officer the key."

links.title: Noid: ""Only if he promises to look into t..."
links.text: "Only if he promises to look into the spookers in the church." He looks at you gravely.

links.title: Andre: ""Officer, I apologize... Noid doesn..."
links.text: "Officer, I apologize... Noid doesn't always understand the joy of giving for the sake of giving. I think it may have something to do with his childhood."

links.title: Rhetoric: "A pincer manoeuvre."
links.text: A pincer manoeuvre.

links.title: Interfacing: "Dammit, take it, don't you just wan..."
links.text: Dammit, take it, don't you just want to see what's *in* there?

links.title: You: ""Okay, just give me the key." (Get..."
links.text: "Okay, just give me the key." (Get the task.)

links.title: You: ""You can't coerce me into taking th..."
links.text: "You can't coerce me into taking this on. I don't need the key." (Not now.)

links.title: Andre: ""Well, if you ever decide to change..."
links.text: "Well, if you ever decide to change your mind, then we're here." He taps the wooden crate he's sitting on. "Just ask me about the door again."

links.title: You: ""How long have those people been lo..."
links.text: "How long have those people been locked in there?"

links.title: Andre: ""Not long. Like a week maybe?" He s..."
links.text: "Not long. Like a week maybe?" He shrugs.

links.title: You: ""How can you be sure they haven't s..."
links.text: "How can you be sure they haven't starved to death?"

links.title: Andre: ""I'm super sure they're alive. I me..."
links.text: "I'm super sure they're alive. I mean, c'mon! I'm at least 90%... maybe 85% sure they're still alive."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Somewhere in the ruinous past that..."
links.text: Somewhere in the ruinous past that led you here there was something called 'exams'. You may have learned the term 'involuntary manslaughter' there.

links.title: You: ""Andre, do you know what 'involunta..."
links.text: "Andre, do you know what 'involuntary manslaughter' means?"

links.title: Andre: ""Yes I do, I listen to Channel 8 al..."
links.text: "Yes I do, I listen to Channel 8 all the time. I know about crime stuff and I assure you, officer, this is not what's happening here. I'm *at least* 80% sure they're alive. I mean, c'mon -- most people aren't ever that alive in their entire lives!"

links.title: You: ""What does that even mean?""
links.text: "What does that even mean?"

links.title: Andre: ""I don't know..." He pauses to thin..."
links.text: "I don't know..." He pauses to think. "What does anything mean, really?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""*Oh yeah...*" He looks at his frie..."
links.text: "*Oh yeah...*" He looks at his friend with an expression of profound understanding.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I catch your drift.""
links.text: "Yeah, I catch your drift."

links.title: Andre: ""I knew you'd get it. You're one sm..."
links.text: "I knew you'd get it. You're one smart cop."

links.title: Volition: "It feels good to be the smart cop,..."
links.text: It feels good to be the smart cop, doesn't it? That's a good cop to be. Has a nice ring to it. "Smart Cop." You wouldn't want to be "Stupid Cop," now would you? But still -- maybe he's just sucking up to you?

links.title: You: ""You can stop buttering me up now,..."
links.text: "You can stop buttering me up now, thank you."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh, okay." He nods his bleached, s..."
links.text: "Oh, okay." He nods his bleached, spiked head. "I won't do that anymore."

links.title: You: ""I get by. Now where was I with tha..."
links.text: "I get by. Now where was I with that padlock..."

links.title: Andre: "He nods attentively, ready to answe..."
links.text: He nods attentively, ready to answer the questions of 'one smart cop.'

links.title: You: ""Sounds like nonsense.""
links.text: "Sounds like nonsense."

links.title: Andre: ""You're right. It *is* nonsense. To..."
links.text: "You're right. It *is* nonsense. Total garbage. I knew you'd see through it, you're one smart cop!"

links.title: You: ""Eight-five percent is not good eno..."
links.text: "Eight-five percent is not good enough when you're dealing with another person's physical well-being."

links.title: Andre: ""Okay, I'm sorry.""
links.text: "Okay, I'm sorry."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I'm sorry, too. I guess it wasn't..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, too. I guess it wasn't very hard core of us to just lock them in like that."

links.title: Noid: ""Me too... I shouldn't have that ki..."
links.text: "Me too... I shouldn't have that kind of power over another person. I'm not the one with the violence monopoly here -- you are. I'm glad that key is out of my hands now."

links.title: You: ""Eighty-five percent is good enough..."
links.text: "Eighty-five percent is good enough. No one lives forever, baby!"

links.title: Andre: ""Exactly! That's *exactly* what we..."
links.text: "Exactly! That's *exactly* what we thought!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""THE CAGE OF THE RAGE, ROUGH BLAZE!""
links.text: "THE CAGE OF THE RAGE, ROUGH BLAZE!"

links.title: Noid: ""Egg means the situation is monitor..."
links.text: "Egg means the situation is monitored." The man nods grimly. "It's 'relatively' safe. No one has died yet."

links.title: You: ""This is cool. Taking initiative li..."
links.text: "This is cool. Taking initiative like this is proper citizen behaviour and I endorse it."

links.title: Andre: ""Thank you, we just thought it was..."
links.text: "Thank you, we just thought it was the right thing to do."

links.title: You: ""Right. Other questions." (Conclude..."
links.text: "Right. Other questions." (Conclude.)

links.title: Andre: ""Sure, man. Tell us what you wanna..."
links.text: "Sure, man. Tell us what you wanna know, let's do it!"

dialogueTree.title: Andre: ""Truth is, I don't really know. Non..."
dialogueTree.text: "Truth is, I don't really know. None of us do. I don't even know how many there are... all we've seen are glimpses."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Glimpses? Who are these people, sec..."
links.text: Glimpses? Who are these people, secret agents? Stealth operatives?

links.title: You: ""You haven't even seen them and you..."
links.text: "You haven't even seen them and you want the police involved?"

links.title: Andre: ""Well..." he leans in for emphasis,..."
links.text: "Well..." he leans in for emphasis, "there's also *the machinery*..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "This machinery is of the deeply mys..."
links.text: This machinery is of the deeply mystical variety.

links.title: Andre: ""When I first scouted the place, ba..."
links.text: "When I first scouted the place, back in February, it was abandoned. Empty. Took some time getting the crew together, so about two weeks ago we came here hoping to set the stuff up. Suddenly there are all these strange *machines* lying around in there."

links.title: Noid: ""One of them has wires running into..."
links.text: "One of them has wires running into bowls of water. Wires. Into *water*. Never seen anything like it."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Andre, tell him about the feeling!""
links.text: "Andre, tell him about the feeling!"

links.title: Andre: ""Oh, and it felt like there was som..."
links.text: "Oh, and it felt like there was some *thing* in there with us, watching us from the dark..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""No! The other one.""
links.text: "No! The other one."

links.title: Andre: ""Uhm, which other one? I'm not as i..."
links.text: "Uhm, which other one? I'm not as in tune with my emotions as you are, Egg."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Felt like silence! Awful silence...""
links.text: "Felt like silence! Awful silence..."

links.title: Empathy: "For this man even regular silence i..."
links.text: For this man even regular silence is awful enough. But that was... something greater.

links.title: You: ""But you haven't physically *seen*..."
links.text: "But you haven't physically *seen* anyone?"

links.title: Andre: ""Not exactly. We've just seen someo..."
links.text: "Not exactly. We've just seen someone who we think is a woman go in and out of the church. A couple of times. And we felt someone... or some *thing*... eyeing us inside. But... that's kinda it."

links.title: You: ""The woman -- red hair maybe? A lor..."
links.text: "The woman -- red hair maybe? A lorry-woman?"

links.title: Andre: ""Sure, why not! Yeah!""
links.text: "Sure, why not! Yeah!"

links.title: Noid: ""But not really," the other one add..."
links.text: "But not really," the other one adds. "Brown hair. Old. Heavy, dark sines."

links.title: You: ""So which one is it?""
links.text: "So which one is it?"

links.title: Andre: ""What Noid said!""
links.text: "What Noid said!"

links.title: Logic: "Ruby's gone. The woman is someone e..."
links.text: Ruby's gone. The woman is someone else.

links.title: Volition: "You have to see for yourself. These..."
links.text: You have to see for yourself. These people are not reliable.

links.title: Logic: "So brown and older? Ruby might have..."
links.text: So brown and older? Ruby might have dyed her hair? Though it seems like a stretch at this point.

links.title: You: ""What was that about some *thing* w..."
links.text: "What was that about some *thing* watching you?"

links.title: Andre: ""Like... you aren't *alone*, you kn..."
links.text: "Like... you aren't *alone*, you know?"

links.title: Noid: ""It wasn't quite *human* -- if you..."
links.text: "It wasn't quite *human* -- if you know what I mean."

links.title: Rhetoric: "*Not human*? As in a ghost? *Do* yo..."
links.text: *Not human*? As in a ghost? *Do* you know what he means?

links.title: Half Light: "Non-human means a predator."
links.text: Non-human means a predator.

links.title: Andre: ""It was this dark shape climbing up..."
links.text: "It was this dark shape climbing upside down along the ceiling... like some kind of *crab-man*."

links.title: You: ""A crab-man?""
links.text: "A crab-man?"

links.title: Andre: ""Yeah, you know. The way it was cli..."
links.text: "Yeah, you know. The way it was climbing up and around the ceiling. Like a crab."

links.title: Noid: ""It was stalking Acele. Exhibiting..."
links.text: "It was stalking Acele. Exhibiting ambush behaviour."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Odd. Crabs are usually marine creat..."
links.text: Odd. Crabs are usually marine creatures. And not known for climbing walls.

links.title: You: ""Are you *sure* there was a crab-ma..."
links.text: "Are you *sure* there was a crab-man?"

links.title: Andre: ""Yeah, totally. I mean... I didn't..."
links.text: "Yeah, totally. I mean... I didn't *personally* see it -- Acele was alone that time, but I believe her. If she comes out running and says there's a crab in there, there's a crab in there."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "So he hasn't even been in there lat..."
links.text: So he hasn't even been in there lately? Is he afraid?

links.title: Noid: ""You should ask her about it -- but..."
links.text: "You should ask her about it -- but be nice. Don't tell her you don't believe in the crab."

links.title: Inland Empire: "The implications of this are... too..."
links.text: The implications of this are... too numerous to consider. Proceed with caution. Learn all you can before entering that dark building.

links.title: Logic: "There probably is no crab-man. Don'..."
links.text: There probably is no crab-man. Don't let them draw you in with this nonsense.

links.title: You: ""Ambush behaviour." (Nod.) "Crab-ma..."
links.text: "Ambush behaviour." (Nod.) "Crab-man."

links.title: Egg Head: ""CRAB-MAN!""
links.text: "CRAB-MAN!"

links.title: You: ""Can you tell me more about this ma..."
links.text: "Can you tell me more about this machinery?"

links.title: Andre: ""You should talk to Noid about that..."
links.text: "You should talk to Noid about that. I just got a distinct *burnout* and *dopehead* sine from them. Probably jacked up to some snuff station too. Probably, very likely."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "With a small surge of PEA, alertnes..."
links.text: With a small surge of PEA, alertness fills you. As if to say: This is a dark corner, look behind it!

links.title: You: ""Jacked up to some *snuff station*?""
links.text: "Jacked up to some *snuff station*?"

links.title: Noid: ""He means like one of those rich-bo..."
links.text: "He means like one of those rich-boy private radio stations, where you can listen to people getting killed on. Then jerk off to it... sick shit."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Must be. Even Cuno knew that."
links.text: Must be. Even Cuno knew that.

links.title: Andre: ""Not that we would know *anything*..."
links.text: "Not that we would know *anything* about that. Noid just likes to relay stuff."

links.title: Drama: "He appears sincere enough, sire. Yo..."
links.text: He appears sincere enough, sire. You could of course be wrong.

links.title: Andre: ""We're getting derailed here. In sh..."
links.text: "We're getting derailed here. In short, you can talk to Noid about the machines. He'll tell you more."

links.title: You: ""I'll talk to Noid then.""
links.text: "I'll talk to Noid then."

links.title: Andre: ""Good idea.""
links.text: "Good idea."

links.title: You: ""So how can you be sure they're *bu..."
links.text: "So how can you be sure they're *burnouts* and *dopeheads* if you haven't even seen them?"

links.title: Andre: ""Well, honestly, I can't. But I am.""
links.text: "Well, honestly, I can't. But I am."

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is a below feeble attempt at a..."
links.text: This is a below feeble attempt at avoidance. Basically, he is attempting to weaponise idiocy.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Why not! Let's go with that."
links.text: Why not! Let's go with that.

links.title: You: ""Wow! You can't. But you do. I shou..."
links.text: "Wow! You can't. But you do. I should add weaponised idiocy to my own repertoire."

links.title: Andre: ""Hey now!" He furrows his brow. "I'..."
links.text: "Hey now!" He furrows his brow. "I'm 70% sure they're substance abusers."

links.title: Andre: ""Don't let all that 'technology' fo..."
links.text: "Don't let all that 'technology' fool you." He makes little quotation marks with his fingers when he says *technology*. "Where do you think drugs come from?"

links.title: You: ""I don't see a single thing wrong w..."
links.text: "I don't see a single thing wrong with that argument."

links.title: Andre: ""I'm 70% sure they're substance use..."
links.text: "I'm 70% sure they're substance users. Don't let the 'technology' fool you." He makes little quotation marks with his fingers when he says *technology*.

links.title: Conceptualization: "The gesture is super-futuristic. Go..."
links.text: The gesture is super-futuristic. Goes well with his spiked imbecile-hair.

links.title: You: ""Alright, let's talk about somethin..."
links.text: "Alright, let's talk about something else."

links.title: Andre: ""Sure. What?""
links.text: "Sure. What?"

links.title: You: ""Better safe than sorry. Anything m..."
links.text: "Better safe than sorry. Anything more you can tell me?"

links.title: Andre: ""Yes," he leans in for emphasis, "t..."
links.text: "Yes," he leans in for emphasis, "there's also *the machinery*..."

links.title: You: ""I see you brought your own water.""
links.text: "I see you brought your own water."

links.title: Andre: ""Yeah, yeah! Good to have, bitch to..."
links.text: "Yeah, yeah! Good to have, bitch to carry. When I first scouted the place I did some reconnaissance. I'm not sure the church even has running water."

links.title: You: ""And it's distilled too.""
links.text: "And it's distilled too."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh?" He doesn't know what to say."
links.text: "Oh?" He doesn't know what to say.

links.title: Andre: ""It's the one they sell at the fuel..."
links.text: "It's the one they sell at the fuel station."

links.title: Drama: "It's like he's lying to you, my lie..."
links.text: It's like he's lying to you, my liege. But he's slippery enough that there's nothing for you to grab hold of.

links.title: You: ""About another thing...""
links.text: "About another thing..."

links.title: You: ""Hate to tell you, but it reeks of..."
links.text: "Hate to tell you, but it reeks of sweat in here."

links.title: Andre: ""It does, doesn't it?""
links.text: "It does, doesn't it?"

links.title: Noid: ""Told you we have a smell problem."..."
links.text: "Told you we have a smell problem." He picks up a piece of telephone cord and inspects it.

links.title: You: ""Wait. I also smell ether. Why?""
links.text: "Wait. I also smell ether. Why?"

links.title: Andre: ""Ether? I don't smell ether. Do you..."
links.text: "Ether? I don't smell ether. Do you, Noid?"

links.title: Noid: ""Nope.""
links.text: "Nope."

links.title: You: ""It's mixed with a peculiar chemica..."
links.text: "It's mixed with a peculiar chemical scent, like laundry detergent..."

links.title: Andre: "He sniffs the air, then shrugs."
links.text: He sniffs the air, then shrugs.

links.title: Logic: "It doesn't take a forensic scientis..."
links.text: It doesn't take a forensic scientist to guess it's drug-related. They look and act like the kind of guys who've done their fair share.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Unlike the girl outside, however, t..."
links.text: Unlike the girl outside, however, the boys' breathing is regular, their jaws stay put, and their pupils aren't dilated. So they're not under the influence *currently*.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "At least not under the influence of..."
links.text: At least not under the influence of stimulants. That doesn't rule out: hallucinogens, benzos, some depressants... how do you know all this?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "However, their breathing is regular..."
links.text: However, their breathing is regular, their jaws stay put, and their pupils aren't dilated. So -- not under the influence right now.

links.title: Logic: "A shrug is good enough for us! Why..."
links.text: A shrug is good enough for us! Why say it when you can *shrug* it.

links.title: You: ""There was another thing...""
links.text: "There was another thing..."

links.title: You: ""What's with all the *Nosaphed*?""
links.text: "What's with all the *Nosaphed*?"

links.title: Andre: ""The what now?" He leans in to hear..."
links.text: "The what now?" He leans in to hear you better.

links.title: You: "(Point at the bottles of nasal spra..."
links.text: (Point at the bottles of nasal spray in the corner.) "The 'Nosaphed Ultra.' You have a lot of it lying around."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh! The old 'Ultra'... we.... uhm...."
links.text: "Oh! The old 'Ultra'... we.... uhm..."

links.title: Drama: "He's like an actor looking to the s..."
links.text: He's like an actor looking to the souffleur for his line.

links.title: Andre: ""I have a major sinus infection. St..."
links.text: "I have a major sinus infection. Stuffy nose. We all do. Shit's all blasted up. Winter. Can't even breathe."

links.title: You: ""You sound fine to me.""
links.text: "You sound fine to me."

links.title: Andre: ""Yes!" He nods energetically. "That..."
links.text: "Yes!" He nods energetically. "That's all Nosaphed's doing. Without the Nosa I'd be drowning in shit right now."

links.title: Noid: ""Nosaphed *is* the shit!""
links.text: "Nosaphed *is* the shit!"

links.title: You: ""Good. Now unto the next thing.""
links.text: "Good. Now unto the next thing."

links.title: You: ""Can I have some? I have some nose..."
links.text: "Can I have some? I have some nose problems too."

links.title: Andre: ""Uhm... sure." He picks one up from..."
links.text: "Uhm... sure." He picks one up from the corner and hands it to you. "Here you go, officer -- the Nosa! Blast away!"

links.title: You: ""Oh, okay, I guess that makes sense..."
links.text: "Oh, okay, I guess that makes sense. Tell me about another thing."

links.title: You: ""The whatever, I wanted to know abo..."
links.text: "The whatever, I wanted to know about another thing."

links.title: You: ""What's that engine starting fluid..."
links.text: "What's that engine starting fluid for?" (Point to the bottle of "Coupris L'Ange.")

links.title: Andre: ""It's for starting engines, man.""
links.text: "It's for starting engines, man."

links.title: Half Light: "Is the amiable speedfreak becoming..."
links.text: Is the amiable speedfreak becoming a bit cross with you? Sounds like it.

links.title: You: ""What engines do you start with it?""
links.text: "What engines do you start with it?"

links.title: Noid: ""What's with the god damn Romangoro..."
links.text: "What's with the god damn Romangorod Hearings? It's cold, the fluid's for the generator." He points toward the machine.

links.title: Drama: "Keep on it, sire."
links.text: Keep on it, sire.

links.title: You: ""How's that extra high ether conten..."
links.text: "How's that extra high ether content working out for you? Does it do the trick?

links.title: Andre: ""I guess it does.""
links.text: "I guess it does."

links.title: Logic: "You're not *completely* satisfied y..."
links.text: You're not *completely* satisfied yet.

links.title: You: ""Super." (Nod, then let the silence..."
links.text: "Super." (Nod, then let the silence linger.) "And what is ethyl ether anyway?"

links.title: Andre: ""No idea, man.""
links.text: "No idea, man."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Did you know ethyl ether is used as..."
links.text: Did you know ethyl ether is used as a light anaesthetic? And a solvent. And an explosive. And for manufacturing amphetamine.

links.title: You: ""Good. Now, about another thing...""
links.text: "Good. Now, about another thing..."

links.title: You: ""All right. Enough of this." (Concl..."
links.text: "All right. Enough of this." (Conclude.)

links.title: Andre: "He nods enthusiastically. No doubt..."
links.text: He nods enthusiastically. No doubt a *little* relieved.
